name: yeasted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
made using yeast (= a type of fungus that is used in making alcoholic drinks such as beer and wine, and for making bread swell and become light): Flours that are high in protein help to give yeasted bread a chewy texture. Rustic breads are often yeasted but may also be naturally leavened. A bagel is traditionally shaped by hand into the form of a ring from yeasted wheat dough. Compare
unleavened
More examplesFewer examplesServe with pittas or a yeasted, crusty bread such as ciabatta.If you suffer from bloating, you should avoid yeasted breads, sugar, dried fruit, carbonated drinks, and alcohol.Barmbrack (Irish: bairín breac) is a yeasted bread with added sultanas and raisins.You can use our unbleached bread flour in all your yeasted baked goods.
